summary: ABOUT 5 MONTHS AGAIN I NOTICE THAT I CAN NOT LEAVE MY LIGHT SWITCH IN AUTO MODE BECAUSE AFTER LOCKING MY DOORS AND ENGAGING THE ALARM I WOULD ALWAYS GET A KNOCK ON THE DOOR IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT WITH MY NEIGHBORS LETTING ME KNOW THAT I LEFT MY LIGHTS ON.
